SELECT g.groupName, g.groupDetail, g.groupImage, g.groupType, g.groupSignUpType, g.groupMaximum, r.regionName, d.districtName, i.interestField, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM group_member gm WHERE gm.groupId = g.groupId AND gm.status = '승인') AS approvedCount FROM `group` g JOIN regions r ON g.groupRegionId = r.regionId JOIN districts d ON g.groupDistrictId = d.districtId JOIN interest i ON g.groupInterestId = i.interestId
AND (g.groupName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR g.groupDetail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND r.regionName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%')
AND d.districtName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{district}, '%')
AND i.interestField = #{interest}
AND g.groupType = #{onlineOffline}
ORDER BY
g.groupId DESC
g.groupId ASC
g.groupId DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT e.eventImage, g.groupName, e.eventDate, e.eventLocation, e.eventName, e.eventDetail, e.eventMaximum, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM event_member em WHERE em.eventId = e.eventId) AS participantCount FROM `event` e JOIN `group` g ON e.groupId = g.groupId
AND (e.eventName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR e.eventDetail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND g.groupRegionId IN (SELECT regionId FROM regions WHERE regionName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%'))
AND g.groupDistrictId IN (SELECT districtId FROM districts WHERE districtName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{district}, '%'))
AND g.groupInterestId IN (SELECT interestId FROM interest WHERE interestField = #{interest})
AND g.groupType = #{onlineOffline}
ORDER BY
e.eventId DESC
e.eventId ASC
e.eventId DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
